Represents an administrator user in the library management system
Constructs an Admin object email The email of the admin username The username of the admin password The password of the admin
Saves the admin s information to a file This function writes the admin s email username password and user type to a file located at It ensures the directory exists before attempting to write the file
The AdminDashboard class provides the interface for administrative actions This class allows administrators to manage users and books in the library system

Main entry point for the application This function initializes the application loads the books from a file sets up the translation system and launches the authentication screen argc Number of command-line arguments argv Array of command-line argument strings Exit status of the application File path to the books data file Input file stream for reading the books data Error message when the file cannot be opened Temporary variable to store each line of the file Parse the line into individual fields separated by commas Convert the string representation of the book count to an integer Create a new book entry in the library database Add the book to the global book manager library Initialize the QApplication instance Translator object for managing application localization Retrieve system UI languages for localization Install the translator for the application if a valid translation is found Launch the authentication screen The authentication screen is initialized with a fixed size and title

main argc argv std::string data std::ifstream dosya data dosya is_open std::cerr data std::string line std::getline dosya line std::istringstream ss line std::string name author genre isbn number num std::getline ss name std::getline ss author std::getline ss genre std::getline ss isbn std::getline ss number num std::stoi number std::invalid_argument e std::cerr number std::out_of_range e std::cerr number Library_Database library_database name author genre isbn num gbookManager library addBook library_database QApplication a argc argv QTranslator translator QStringList uiLanguages QLocale::system uiLanguages QString locale uiLanguages QString baseName QLocale locale name translator load baseName a installTranslator translator AuthScreen w w setFixedSize w setWindowTitle w show a exec main argc argv std::string data std::ifstream dosya data dosya is_open std::cerr data std::string line std::getline dosya line std::istringstream ss line std::string name author genre isbn number num std::getline ss name std::getline ss author std::getline ss genre std::getline ss isbn std::getline ss number num std::stoi number std::invalid_argument e std::cerr number std::out_of_range e std::cerr number Library_Database library_database name author genre isbn num gbookManager library addBook library_database QApplication a argc argv QTranslator translator QStringList uiLanguages QLocale::system uiLanguages QString locale uiLanguages QString baseName QLocale locale name translator load baseName a installTranslator translator AuthScreen w w setFixedSize w setWindowTitle w show a exec

Defines the User class which represents a user in the library system This file declares the User class including its member variables and functions that handle user information and interaction with the library system
